summary: Final verification testing for La Pulpería app before launch. All 22 backend API tests passed. Frontend landing page loads correctly with red nebula effect and floating particles. Protected routes correctly redirect to login. Ad Assignment Log public page works correctly.

issues: ✅ Red nebula effect and floating particles working correctly
✅ Google OAuth button visible and styled correctly
✅ Page loads correctly with proper styling and log entries visible

critical_code_review_comments: ✅ Pulpero.js component correctly named (not Pulpito.js) with human-like Spanish messages from the pulpería owner
✅ Pulpero messages simulate the owner speaking: '¡Hola! Ya recibí tu pedido...', '¡Ya estoy en eso! Preparando con cariño...', '¡Listo compa! Ya podés pasar a buscarlo'
✅ MyOrders.js correctly imports and uses Pulpero component with getPulperoMessage for status messages
✅ ShoppingCart.js has image support for products (lines 191-196)
✅ Header.js has notification dropdown with order status management for pulperia owners
✅ PulperiaDashboard customization panel has all required sections: Live Preview, Basic Info, Images (logo/banner), Location, Contact, Visual Style (colors/fonts)
✅ AdminPanel.js has password protection with 'AlEjA127' password (line 20)
✅ useWebSocket.js hook correctly handles WebSocket connections with auto-reconnect
✅ ProtectedRoute.js correctly redirects unauthenticated users to landing page
⚠️ ESLint warnings in AnimatedBackground.js (line 76) and PulperiaDashboard.js (line 212) for useEffect dependencies - not critical
⚠️ ESLint errors in calendar.jsx and command.jsx are from shadcn UI library - not critical
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing data
context_for_next_testing_agent: All public API endpoints tested and working. Protected routes require Google OAuth authentication. Admin panel requires admin email (onol4sco05@gmail.com) and password (AlEjA127). The Pulpero component has human-like Spanish messages simulating the pulpería owner speaking to customers. The customization panel in PulperiaDashboard has live preview, basic info, images, location, contact, and visual style sections. WebSocket hook is correctly implemented for real-time notifications.
